name: Atelier Totori: The Adventurer of Arland
name_original: Atelier Totori: The Adventurer of Arland
description: The small fishing village of Alanya on the Arland Republic's southern border is home to the young alchemist-in-training Totooria Helmold. Called Totori by her friends and family, she wishes to become a great adventurer and explore the world beyond her hometown. She will make many friends along her journey of discovery - some new, some familiar. Your actions over the course of the game will dictate whether she finds the answers to her questions.
